[@samelogic/samelogic-js](./samelogic-js.md) &gt; [Project](./samelogic-js.project.md)

## Project interface

The project object that represents the Samelogic Project for the current environment.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Project 
```

## Remarks

This object is retrieved from the Samelogic platform using the [Options.appId](./samelogic-js.options.appid.md)<!-- -->.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [metadata?](./samelogic-js.project.metadata.md) | ProjectMetadata | <i>(Optional)</i> Metadata for the project. |
|  [workflows](./samelogic-js.project.workflows.md) | [WorkflowConfig](./samelogic-js.workflowconfig.md)<!-- -->\[\] | The list of currently \*\*active\*\* workflows. Worklows must be published to be active. |
